inclusion.criterion: received 10- to 14-day course of SOC therapy with oral VAN followed by a tapered VAN regimen
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: active chronic diarrheal illness, such as (but not limited to) ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: planned surgery for CDI within 24 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of 2 prior C diff infections and was treated with Vanco for an extended course of 6 weeks. She is highly unlikely to become pregnant due to being female.
